Keywords: Armor , Cabal , Latveria , Mystical , Politician , Ruler , Scientist
Real Name: Victor Von Doom
Special Powers
(+5) WHY DO ALL YOUR ROBOTS LOOK LIKE YOU AGAIN?: When placing characters during game setup, place Dr. Doom on this card and generate two [F4] 005 Doombots in your starting area. // This game, when a friendly 005 Doombot is KO'd, you may immediately place Dr. Doom from this card into their square, and must do so if no other friendly [F4] 005 Doombot is on the map. // While Dr. Doom is on this card, [F4] 005 Doombots can use Leadership.
MY ROBOTS OFTEN CONFUSE MY FOES: Leadership, Mastermind. When Dr. Doom uses Leadership and succeeds, instead of the normal effect, you may generate a [F4] 005 Doombot.

Played this guy today for the first time and was impressed with how well he played. For a total of 50pts Doom brings great powers and numbers between himself and his Doombots.
